scripts.android: yarn install && npx expo prebuild --platform android --clean && npx expo run:android
scripts.android:device: yarn install && npx expo prebuild --platform android --clean && npx expo run:android --device
scripts.ios: yarn install && npx expo prebuild --platform ios --clean && cd ios && pod install && cd .. && npx expo run:ios
scripts.ios:device: yarn install && npx expo prebuild --platform ios --clean && cd ios && pod install && cd .. && npx expo run:ios --device
scripts.deep-clean:android: rm -rf android && npx expo prebuild --platform android --clean && cd android && ./gradlew clean --no-daemon && cd ..
